title: What is a Digital Nomad?.
content: You hear buzz words like 'Gig-economy', 'Digital nomads' and freelancers all the time, what does it all mean? Come a little closer and I will tell you!

title: What is a freelancer?
content: To understand anything at its core. We must know its definition. If you have not already read my blog ''What is a Digital Nomad?'' then check it out first because there I have broken down some facts that separate digital nomads from freelancers.

title: Why you should become a freelancer.
content: Have you ever thought of becoming a freelancer, but didn’t know where to start? Well, you my friend have come to the right place.

title: Why you should not become a freelancer.
content: There are so many great things about becoming a freelancer, but that there’s more to it than just freedom, that’s what I will unravel here.  If you haven’t already, please read my first blog “Why you should become a freelancer.” before reading the this one. You will thank me for it.

title: How to become a freelancer.
content: Assuming you have read both of my previous blogs, it’s time to dive into the how of free lancing. Here I will share more info about my personal journey as a freelancer.
